definition: to break (e.g. stick or bone)/a loss
to turn sth over/to turn upside down/to tip sth out (of a container)

to break/to fracture/to snap/to suffer loss/to bend/to twist/to turn/to change direction/convinced/to convert into (currency)/discount/rebate/tenth (in price)/classifier for theatrical scenes/to fold/accounts book
to fold/to fold over in layers/to furl/to layer/to pile up/to repeat/to duplicate

sentences.english: Folded in the card was a piece of paper.
sentences.chinese: 只见生日卡里夹着一张折叠起来的纸。

sentences.english: I am glad to know that folding bikes are allowed in the subway , another reason for me to have one .
sentences.chinese: 乐得见到折仔上地铁，我要买折叠的另一个理由。

sentences.english: Berths convert to seats for daytime use.
The swift fold works well with your zip-up hoodie.
sentences.chinese: 折叠工程的迅速和你的拉链帽衫。

sentences.english: The bold folk fold up the gold or hold it in hor.
sentences.chinese: 大胆的大部份人将金子折叠起来拿在手里。

sentences.english: Both arms folded and he'd push most of his chips into the betting circle.
sentences.chinese: 两臂折叠起来告诉他应该把大部分的筹码都押上。

sentences.english: When the cards have been folded into one pile, the volunteer spreads them out on the table.
sentences.chinese: 当纸牌折叠成一撂时，志愿者将其摊开在桌子上。

sentences.english: Brillo foldable toothbrushes are designed for frequent travelers.
sentences.chinese: Brillo可折叠式牙刷专为经常旅行的人设计。

sentences.english: Where do I go to buy a foldaway umbrella?
Pen and brown -ink wash on vellum paper folded twice. 8x7 in.
sentences.chinese: 钢笔，棕色墨水，折叠两次的羊皮纸。

sentences.english: There were guests at Xiaoming's house, so tonight he has to sleep in the folding bed.
sentences.chinese: 小明家里来了客人，今晚他只能睡折叠床了。

sentences.english: These doors are made in pieces that can be folded away against the wall.
sentences.chinese: 这些门都是几块拼成的，可以折叠起来靠在墙上。

sentences.english: I folded my notepaper and headed for the library.
sentences.chinese: 我折叠起笔记本，往图书馆走去。

sentences.english: The rough edges should lap under.
sentences.chinese: 毛边应该向下折叠进去。

sentences.english: Step 3: Fold your sweaters in acid-free tissue paper, which you can find online or in good stationery stores.
sentences.chinese: 折叠毛衣放入无酸性纸巾中，可在网上或新据点找到。

sentences.english: Collapses the selected node so that re-expanding it displays current information.
sentences.chinese: 折叠选定的节点，重新展开它后便可显示最新的信息。

definition: to sell at a 50% discount/to fold in two
to roll/to turn over/to invert/to flip
to fold/to fold over in layers/to furl/to layer/to pile up/to repeat/to duplicate
to bend/to curve around/curved/crooked/to wind/to warp
to fold the corner of a page/to dog-ear
to flatten out (paper, film, metal plates etc)
